item.description:
You are invited to join JP Cohousing members for an informal meal where you get to eat what you like best... because you bring your take-out meal with you! Dinner will be followed at 8 PM by a movie in the Living Room. Join us! Movie details are listed below.

WILD HEARTS CAN'T BE BROKEN
Based on a true story, this family film chronicles the adventures of Depression-era teenager Sonora Webster (Gabrielle Anwar), who runs away from her foster home to join a carnival. Sonora is determined to become a diving girl, a performer who rides a trained horse as it dives from a high platform into deep water. Although she faces nearly universal adversity along the way, she refuses to give up and keeps fighting for her dreams.
item.how_to_find_us: Find your way to the Common House and ask for Jeney or Diane.
item.name: "Bring Your Own Dinner" and Movie Night at JP Cohousing
